channel.title: Help with xp rate
channel.description:
well ok first when ever im attacking i hit 0 without any thing on and only 0 how would i change that?? 2nd my xp rate is 25 can any one tell me where or how to fix that?? 3rd i cant train def can any one help?? please if your not going to help please dont post
ANY BODY?!?!?!

item.title: Help with xp rate

item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

Usally most sources have armor like white,black guiled try those they probably have high bonuses…and second you might need to edit ur stats…?
